Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Radar display intermittent blanking. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component.
Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 24/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma
